ca.cs.ualberta.localpost.controller

Class CommentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.cs.ualberta.localpost.controller.CommentController

  • public class CommentController
extends java.lang.Object
    CommentController is in charge of modifying, uploading and retrieving the comment model
    Author:
    Team Radish Source code for pushComment(), getComment(), updateComment(), deleteComment(), getEntityContent taken mostly from: https://github.com/rayzhangcl/ESDemo/blob/master/ESDemo/src/ca/ualberta/cs/CMPUT301/chenlei/ESClient.java
